title: First experimental evaluation of pharmaceutical industry-led access program

title_detail.value: First experimental evaluation of pharmaceutical industry-led access program

summary: A new study is the first to use a randomized trial design to generate rigorous evidence on the impact of a pharmaceutical industry-led medicines access program.

summary_detail.value: A new study is the first to use a randomized trial design to generate rigorous evidence on the impact of a pharmaceutical industry-led medicines access program.
